config.name: tiobench
config.description: QA siege benchmark against http://localhost, different number of threads

worker.command: #!/bin/bash /etc/init.d/apache2 start echo Running TIObench in Screen screen -S tiobench-hamsta -L -d -m /bin/bash -c '/usr/share/qa/tools/tiobench-run' sleep 1 while screen -ls | grep tiobench-hamsta > /dev/null ; do sleep 1; done echo Done
